item.title: Significance Test
item.description: The main idea is we need to know whether this distribution is more likely to happen from another distribution with a level of p. So w need three things: The first distribution (base) and its parameter The second distribution (comparator) and its parameter A limit/threshold for which we could safely say this is different. The Z - Test The T-test is for small use case â‰¤ 30, whereas the z-test is for the normal case.
